fields.description:
Recently Hadoop upgraded to use Protobuf 2.5.0. To build the trunk, I updated my installed Protobuf 2.5.0. With this upgrade, I didn't encounter the build failure due to protoc, but failed when building HDFS sub-project. Bellow is failure message. I'm using Mac OS X.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Maven OutOfMemory exception when building with protobuf 2.5.0
